Name: Anemo Crystalfly
Desc: Pure elemental life-forms composed of drifting Anemo particles, as free and unbound as the butterflies they resemble.\nA glittering Anemo creature that is the product of rising and condensing elements, and which feeds off the ubiquitous power of Anemo.\nThey say that the flapping of a butterfly's wings has the power to whip up a storm.
